thread.title: SRK's wife Gauri Khan turns a year older
thread.title_full: SRK's wife Gauri Khan turns a year older - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: SRK's wife Gauri Khan turns a year older
text:
Gauri Khan turns a year older today. The star wife's close buddies from the industry will drop in to wish her on her 45th birthday.

Gauri Khan 
Gauri has also just collaborated with tech guru Peter Lyngdorf, known for his breakthroughs in the high-end audio space, for her interior decor business. So there is one more reason to celebrate with an extra cake.
